    • Method Detail

      • foreach

        public static <T> jsr166y.RecursiveAction foreach(java.util.List<T> list,
                                                  com.google.common.base.Function<? super T,java.lang.Void> f,
                                                  int size)
        Creates a RecursiveAction which applies a function f to all elements in the given list. If the size of the list exceeds the given size, then the list will be split into partitions of that size and f will be applied on them in parallel.
        Parameters:
        list - the elements on which the function will be applied
        f - the function to apply
        size - the desired size of each sublist (the last may be smaller)
        Returns:
        a RecursiveAction which should be executed with a ForkJoinPool

                                                     int size)
